name: Thread (Medow)
description:
I fixed a game breaking bug that the player started with all the abilities on game start, as well as many quality of life improvements. May need to redownload. Your save data should carry over.

A game made by Medow for the 2nd Vaultacular Game Jam. (Missed the submission period)

A metroidvania with a limitation of 3 abilities.

A strange influence has come over the god hand of the land of puppets. We need a hero to save the world.

Contols:

Arrow keys: to move and jump

Down: arrow to interact and close textboxes.

Z: to attack

X: to use ability

The music button turns off and on the ambient cave and wind sounds.

Description:

I made this game solo using all of my free time for the 2 week period. Art has always been my weakness when making games, so I wanted to challenge myself to create a game that forces me to make a lot of art. So the idea of a medtroidvania came to mind. This was also my first time ever animating.

Thanks to my brother Andrew for the nice ambient sounds. https://gummerfly.bandcamp.com/ 

All develoment, art, and sound fx made by Medow.
